5000000.desc:
Shortly after defeating Maxwell, one of the Four Fallen Gods, Karl suddenly appears to ask the Summoner's help in defeating a dragon.
Not only is this dragon quite strong, but it is said to flee the second it senses danger.
The Summoner and Karl plan a strategy to prevent the dragon from running away, when suddenly...
5000000.name: Demonic Agitation

5000001.desc:
After the crisis in Cordelica, the Summoner and Karl run into Lugina, who has a special request from Summoners' Hall.
He says they are to survey a great forest where the treasure of an empress is hidden.
The Summoner and Lugina take different routes to reach the same forest, but end up running into each other on a third route where they spot Paris...
5000001.name: Proud Soldier's Feast

5000002.desc:
Not long after defeating Zevalhua, one of the Four Fallen gods, Karl and Seria show up to ask the Summoner for help in defeating Graham, the demon they have been after for so many years.
As the three of them reach the region Graham oversees, many of his sly traps lie in waiting unbeknownst to them.
5000002.name: Cobalt Spirit's Waking

5000003.desc: After defeating Maxwell, the Summoner receives an urgent request from Akras Summoners' Hall. The Demon Algmos has been spotted and a squad has been sent to slay him, but Seria ignored orders and went to seek him out alone. The Hall wants you to bring her back safely.It seems Algmos's decimation of a squad Seria had led in the past started it all...
5000003.name: The Crimson God's Cry

5000004.desc: After facing Lucius, the Summoner receives a request from Elder Grahdens.He wants the Summoner to defeat the Demon Mashreed as a training exercise. However, Mashreed is not the only demon in the area, as there are many others in the mix.Grahdens is ready to wipe the floor with these demons, but it seems he has some particular expectations in mind.
5000004.name: The Old Dawn General

5000005.desc: Shortly after defeating Maxwell, one of the Four Fallen Gods, the Summoner receives a mission from Lin. She wants to use her mechanical tools to survey a territory that seems to be connected to Grand Gaia, and wants the Summoner to act as her bodyguard. Thus, the two leave together on their journey, unexpectedly running into many monsters along the way...
5000005.name: Lin's Long Day

5000006.desc: Having defeated Lucius, Paris takes a moment to herself in the Imperial Library when Noel appears. He says there is a place where she can find her true self, and thus she sets off on a journey there. While on her way, she runs into the Summoner who's in the area, though she decides to continue on her own. However, another sudden meeting turns the tables...
5000006.name: Virtual Garden

5000007.desc: Moments after defeating the sealed god Lucius, Noel sends the Summoner on a mission along with Lugina. However, the demon they are after has the ability to reflect the souls of its opponents, unexpectedly drawing Lugina into a fierce battle with his doppelganger. Meanwhile, Karl is on a mission in the area under orders from Grahdens, but...
5000007.name: Warped Reflection

5000008.desc: During the great war with the gods, Palmyna suffers an invasion from the troops led by Cardes the Malevolent. With the kingdom facing a terrible danger, Princess Edea dons the enchanted armor Lafdranya and sets off on a journey to meet companions Lorand, Loch, and Dean. Together they join the rest of the royal army and head towards the last battle.
5000008.name: Gathering Hope

5000009.desc: After a fierce battle, Edea and her friends succeed in sealing Cardes away. However, the price paid to accomplish this was far too high, as Princess Edea has fallen into a deep slumber. Having been scattered in different directions by Edea's powers, her friends begin regrouping in order to save her. The three believe there is still hope.
5000009.name: Four Heroes of Palmyna

5000010.desc: Not long before the great war with the gods, a young lady from the La Veda Republic called Michele witnessed a strange dark object fall from the sky. After meeting Duel-GX and learning that it has come from another world chasing the winged armor "Melchio," which had been destroying neighboring towns, Michele begins her journey to destroy Melchio...
5000010.name: Ten-Winged Tormentor

5000011.desc: Not long after Maxwell's defeat, Noah and the Summoner decide to accept a new Raid mission. However, since Elise has taken the day off from her duties as the receptionist, she's not there. Owen then suddenly appears to report that a demon has appeared on the mountain where Elise and her friends are having a picnic. She must be saved as soon as possible...
5000011.name: Hopes & Regrets

5000012.desc: Just before the great war with the gods, the Guardians of Meirith receive new orders. They travel to Ishgria in order to defeat the demon Ragruvord, who is attempting to invade Grand Gaia. However, before they can confront him, a messenger appears from the gods. They hear that someone is after Karna Masta, and are ordered to return to Grand Gaia immediately.
5000012.name: The Correct Path

5000013.desc: The 7 leaders of the Akras Summoners' Hall Demon Slayers--Griff, Iris, Kafka, Rhoa, Libera, Krantz, and Mirfah--head to the world of Ishgria to survey the land. However, they face an enormous demon soon after arriving. Their leader, Griff, goes after the demon alone. As acting commander, Krantz leads the rest to where the return gate should be, but...
5000013.name: Entrusted Will

5000014.desc: It began not long after Maxwell was defeated... Sera had always been serious, but she had begun to make odd statements to herself while lost in thought. Lin happened to overhear her while passing by and became fixated on the changes in Sera. Lin soon reached a conclusion, then invited Elise and the Summoner to follow Sera after work one day...
5000014.name: A Maiden's Despair

5000015.desc: In the closing days of the war between gods and humanity, Reed, Lucana, and Aneil attempted to save survivors. They led the people with them as they headed for Mistral, the site of the promised land. The group encountered Rhein, Eru, and Nevsky along the way, and together they managed to make it to where the promised land was just ahead. But Mistral was also home to a threatening presence...
5000015.name: Those Who Lead

5000016.desc: During the final stages of the war against the gods, the Bariura Empire is surrounded by the God Army. As the capital crumbles before their eyes, Sirius and the first princess Selvia decide to act to protect the imperial family's legacy. However, their plan could result in national unrest, which drives Sirius to question whether he should go forth with it...
5000016.name: The End of an Empire

5008001.desc: The relics of Athensphere have yielded interesting results. Noels thirst for knowledge has the summoner searching for a particular figure in the memory gear
5008001.name: The Tinkerers Deceit

5008002.desc: The tracks of the mysterious kidnapper have led Avani to Ostagoth, capital city of the Morokai. Just what do they have planned for Ezra?
5008002.name: Eneroth: Genesis

5008003.desc: The final journey into the heart of Fuindor begins. What foes will our intrepid heroes face?
5008003.name: Crossing the Abyss

5008008.desc: Aimyhr is in peril. Ensa-Taya has sent her Voidborn to devour every last being on this world. Forced to ally with the human kingdoms against a common enemy,  Zeruiah bestows Faefire upon their delegate, Baelfyr.
5008008.name: Everlasting Embrace

5008009.desc: Three years after the Crystalline Spire, memories of the Voidborn still linger in the minds of men. Tensions begin to run high as Fae and Naga activity increase. "The stars have aligned," the wise say. "Our fates are coming to a close."
5008009.name: Fates of the Fallen

5008010.desc: The birth of Kranus brought a change in the Void. Mysterious forces are now actively shaping events in the infinite worlds littered throughout the cosmos. Back in Randall, Noel ponders the age old question: "Was our will ever our own?"
5008010.name: The Echoing Void

5008011.desc:
The Summoner is --

Well, that wasn't so difficult. That annoying Voidling made it seem like a big deal.

I will bring peace to this universe at long last... and nothing shall stop me this time.
5008011.name: Liminal End

5200000.desc: Under Lucius's orders, Tilith, Karl, and Seria travel to another world to defeat a demon, but they're somehow unable to return. Grahdens believes this is connected to the demon which appeared right after they had crossed over, so he sends the Summoner, Lugina, and Paris after it. However, they unexpectedly run into three otherworldly beings on the way...
5200000.name: Otherworldly Visitors

5200002.desc: The Akras Summoners' Hall has been notified of the appearance of a great god-like presence from another world, so the Summoner and Grahdens head towards it. There they run into Karl and Seria, who are protecting people who fight for humanity in their home world amidst a  war among multitudes of gods. The Summoners must now help these girls get back home.
5200002.name: Choice for the Future

6000000.desc: A place where Summoners can train for battle by setting certain settings and conditions.
6000000.name: Summoners' Training Ground

7000000.desc: "I wanted to see you fight for real" says the man with the blunt weapon. "I'll give you this sword if you win. Is that motivation enough to fight?"
7000000.name: HEAVY DAY Lv.1

7000010.desc: The enemy is knocked down in body, but not in spirit. The Summoner shudders in trepidation at the "heavy" explosion that wells forth from within.
7000010.name: HEAVY DAY Lv.2

8001721.desc: Two worlds collide as a happy celebration brings adventure to some lucky souls! Who are they? Find out!
8001721.name: Parallel Festivals

8001722.desc: Look, bandits! Here to crash the party, it would seem. Or are they the entertainment?
8001722.name: A Band-it Party

8300031.desc: A group of maidens barged in here and demanded to use my sacred lab to test each other's strength!! Get in there and appease them so I can return to my experiments!
8300031.name: Trial No. X2

8300811.desc: It seems a strange creature from Paskua has come to Grand Gaia in search of something. What could it be after, and why?
8300811.name: The Hunt Begins

8300812.desc: Although it seemed as if Cotton was after Carrol, it was actually after the eggs she's been collecting. Will she just hand them over?
8300812.name: Persegguted

8300813.desc: Carrol and Cotton face off in a battle for the mystical eggs. However, kindness is one of Carrol's most admirable traits...
8300813.name: Uneggspected Friend

8301001.desc: You have arrived at the tower where the formidable monster is rumored to be dwelling. It's dark and the cold, still air sends a chill up your spine.
8301001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 1-10

8301100.desc:
DO NOT ENTER!
Enter Frontier Rift via Randall Survey Office.
Please refer to our official channels for more information.
8301100.name: Raug Phantasm Lv. 1

8301101.desc: Noel has sent you to investigate an anomaly near Randall. Meanwhile, a fiery warrior can be seen in the distance...
8301101.name: A Scarlet Abyss

8301102.desc: As you explore the building, blood is thick in the air. Everyone around you seems to be fighting each other!  What is going on?
8301102.name: The Maw of Darkness

8301103.desc: Death stalks the halls as you reach the center of this madness; the silence is overpowering. What insanity will you meet here?
8301103.name: A Dark Resurrection

8301104.desc: Learn to harness the power of Fire and Thunder with a sparring match versus Mai and Benimaru! Are you ready for this?
8301104.name: Burning Electrocution

8301105.desc: Learn to harness the forces of Water and Earth with a sparring match against Kula and Terry! Are you going to be okay?
8301105.name: Granite Undertow

8301106.desc: Learn to harness the energy of Light and Dark with a sparring match against Athena and Iori! Care to wager on your odds?
8301106.name: Scintillating Darkness

8301107.desc: Time to put your skills on the line in a royal rumble fit for legends! Embrace the elements and let them guide you to victory!
8301107.name: Two Enter, Only One Leaves

8301131.desc: You've been sent to check on the phenomena caused by newcomers from beyond the "Backyard." Are you ready for wild dragons and thunderstorms?
8301131.name: A Revelating Survey

8301132.desc: More newcomers have arrived, including a strange two-winged girl, and her blond companion. They claim to be looking for a friend in a wedding gown...
8301132.name: Dizzying Golden Locks

8301133.desc: Two more deadly beauties have arrived. Is it heaven, or hell? Only one thing's for sure--your heart might just be Overdrived into an Instant Kill!
8301133.name: Explosive Brawl

8301134.desc: Turns out Elphelt was just looking for eternal love. It's a beautiful day for a wedding, and she looks lovely in her gown. Time to declare your love!
8301134.name: A Grand Reception

8301141.desc: Time to take a drive on the wild side! Put that pedal to the metal--Crash Belt's here for some high-impact adventure!
8301141.name: The Power of the Sky

8301142.desc: Down the river you go! Gazolina's ready to make a splash--in style! Can you handle the heat?
8301142.name: Swish Swash

8301143.desc: Witness your final showdown with Natalame! Will you stand tall, or will you bite the desert dust? Ready! Steady! Go!
8301143.name: Cold Cauldron

8301144.desc: Fairy Tail wizards have appeared through an anomaly in the vortex. They seem to think you're with a "Dark Guild." What's going on?!
8301144.name: Through Fire and Ice

8301145.desc: Be careful! Lucy and Erza have joined the battle, and it looks like they're siding with the others. When will this misunderstanding end?!
8301145.name: Let There Be Light

8301146.desc: Seems like Fairy Tail isn't backing down from an offensive stance. You've got one shot to help them understand things, so make it count!
8301146.name: Towards Fantasia

8301147.desc: A disturbance has appeared in Ishgria--a mysterious door has opened to a Dark realm. What could be going on?
8301147.name: The Origin of Darkness

8301148.desc: Near the gate, a shadowy figure appears. Who is he, and just what are his intentions?
8301148.name: Darkness Within

8301149.desc: The shadowy figure near the gate turns out to be Mard Geer, from the same world as Fairy Tail. Will your efforts be enough to stop him?
8301149.name: Tartaros

8301151.desc: Battle monsters and gain treasures for evolving your units! To the brave go the spoils!
8301151.name: Omni Arcanum Lv. 1

8301152.desc: Many have delved deep into these halls and never returned. Can you handle the monsters within? Reap the rewards with every victory!
8301152.name: Omni Arcanum Lv. 2

8301153.desc: Can you succeed where others have failed? Gain vital items for empowering your units and show them who's boss!
8301153.name: Omni Arcanum Lv. 3

8301171.desc: Flickering lights dart through the murky fog above the path, struggling to escape from the darkness
8301171.name: Path to Possession

8301172.desc: With the night as their escort, they strolled through the darkened land. Beware, those who would cross their path
8301172.name: Queens of the Night

8301173.desc: Within the dark forest, sweet laughter danced above the cries of despair
8301173.name: Lady Domina

8301181.desc: After he sacrificed his luck and saved a child, Kitsu has been constantly on the run. He is so tired
8301181.name: Kitsu's Wandering

8301182.desc: Linlin and Bjorn has been looking for Kitsu for a long time. Will they find him before he succumbs to fatigue?
8301182.name: Linlin and Bjorn's Search

8301183.desc: Kitsu and Linlin are finally reunited! They have no time to catch up, though, as the fox, fairy and bear are quickly surrounded by Kitsu's pursuers.
8301183.name: Clash

8301190.desc: You emerged from the gate onto an unexpectedly ordinary plain. Ordinary, aside from the sounds of battle and clashing swords.
8301190.name: The Will Of Man L1

8301191.desc: The gate led you into the heart of a raging battle, and there is no time to do anything but fight the foes that turn to face you.
8301191.name: The Will Of Man L2

8301192.desc: A powerful young knight, with blood stains matching his crimson hair, has mistaken you for the enemy. Defend yourself or be destroyed!
8301192.name: The Will Of Man L3

8301200.desc:
DO NOT ENTER!
Enter Frontier Rift via Randall Survey Office.
Please refer to our official channels for more information.
8301200.name: Raug Phantasm Lv. 2

8301201.desc: A powerful force has invaded Grand Gaia through the Vortex Gate. The Summoners' Hall has called upon you to investigate this "Veritas of the Dark."
8301201.name: An Explosive Disaster

8301202.desc: The man called Veritas of the Dark is growing stronger! You must fight back until the reinforcements from Summoners' Hall reach you!
8301202.name: A New Darkness Arises

8301203.desc: This is it! The combined effort of every hero is needed to defeat the enemy. With your help (and a little luck), victory will come soon enough!
8301203.name: Fighting for the Light

8301204.desc: Oh no! Snow Miku's lost her way! Good thing you're here to help, Summoner! But be careful not to hit her, okay? Aim only for the bad guys!
8301204.name: Lost in Transition

8301205.desc: Great job, Summoner! Now all you have to do is escort our young guest to--wait, where is she going? What is that in the distance?!
8301205.name: The World Is A Stage

8301206.desc: Almost there, Summoner! It's time for the performance of a lifetime! Miku, take it away!
8301206.name: A New Beginning

8301221.desc: When she heard of the beautiful cherry blossoms in Grand Gaia, Senbonzakura Miku knew she had to see them for herself. Her journey's just begun...!
8301221.name: Miracle Star Song

8301222.desc: Meanwhile, a concert is already underway in a forgotten forest. Miku presses on and soon realizes she isn't the only singer in this bizarre world...
8301222.name: Cherry Blossom Concert

8301223.desc: As the two singers' voices resonate in unison, the snow begins to make way for a new spring. Whose voice shall echo for all eternity?
8301223.name: Sweet Spring Encore

8301231.desc: Hello! Wow, what are these words? Ooh, that's pretty! Do you want to join my balloons, Summoner? Come on in!
8301231.name: Balloon Mania

8301232.desc: Oooh, hi! Are you having fun? That's great, 'coz everyone's going to have a great time--even if they don't know it! So hop on in!
8301232.name: More Eggs for All

8301233.desc: Look, it's me, Ellie! And just in time too! We're going to have a hoppening time together, I know it! See what I did there? Tee-hee!
8301233.name: Sweet Harlequin

8301234.desc: Wait, what is that? It's the Mother of Frogs! And a big one too! Betcha can't get to it first! I'll race you to it!
8301234.name: Mother of Frogs

8301241.desc: Time to test your mettle against Ochaco Uraraka! Hope you know how to fly!
8301241.name: A Weightless Start

8301242.desc: The fight's just getting started! Can you take Izuku Midoriya head-on, or will you break under his assault?
8301242.name: Path of a Hero

8301243.desc: Two heroes for the price of one! Are you ready for this battle at the Unforseen Simulation Joint? Let's go!
8301243.name: One More Match

8301251.desc: Jump around with Tsuyu Asui in our opening matchup! Will you succeed in this sticky situation?
8301251.name: Ready Hoppity Go

8301252.desc: Kaboom! Can you keep up with Katsuki Bakugo and his special moves?
8301252.name: Explosive Matchup

8301253.desc: Time for the battle's climax! Can you defeat the Symbol of Peace? Time to find out!
8301253.name: All Might Fistfight

8301261.desc: During the season of autumn, a Moon Fairy is known to masquerade as a mortal in these moonlit forests. Find her to seek her blessing!
8301261.name: Autumn's Moonlight

8301262.desc: As you approach deeper into the moonlit forest, a herd of rabbits coaxes you over towards a brightly lit sanctum. Follow them to uncover their secrets!
8301262.name: Rabbit Chase!

8301263.desc: The rabbits were enticed by a mysterious girl making what seems to be fluffy rice cakes. With a giggle, she playfully requests that you play a game with her!
8301263.name: Desirous Mochi

8301264.desc: With little time left, QiuTong asks for a final game with her. Send her off with a smile that is as bright as the full moon!
8301264.name: Moonlight Valediction

8301271.desc: The Main Hall is dusty from abandonment, and a few doors lead to the rest of this forbidding manor. Your search begins here.
8301271.name: Main Hall

8301272.desc: This kitchen has once seen a lot of use, but now lays forgotten from neglect. Pots and utensils are strewn everywhere.
8301272.name: Kitchen

8301273.desc: Compared to the rest of the manor, the study is still well-kept. Books on medicine and other disciplines fill the shelves.
8301273.name: The Study

8301274.desc: Amateur paintings, mostly of flowers and skeletons, hang on the wall. You can't help but feel that you are being watched.
8301274.name: The Gallery

8301275.desc: Attached to the kitchen is a storage, though any food has long since rotted. There might be something tucked away here.
8301275.name: Storage

8301276.desc: At the top of the stairwell stands a shadowy silhouette, though it does not seem to have noticed your presence...yet.
8301276.name: Main Stairway

8301281.desc: This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day in the summer. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside
8301281.name: Summer Paradise

8301291.desc: The loft on the second floor is littered with glass shards and broken frames. Two rooms and a hallway lead from here.
8301291.name: Loft

8301292.desc: The second floor hallway terminates in an attic. A thorough search through the cluttered boxes may uncover something.
8301292.name: Attic

8301293.desc: Eerie muttering emanates from what appears to be a child's playroom. The shadowy figure seems be pacing around in there
8301293.name: Playroom

8301300.desc:
DO NOT ENTER!
Enter Frontier Rift via Randall Survey Office.
Please refer to our official channels for more information.
8301300.name: Raug Phantasm Lv. 3

8301301.desc: Having explored the rest of the manor, only the bedroom remains. Laughter punctuated by choked sobs fills the eerie air.
8301301.name: Master Bedroom

8301310.desc: The mix-up with Wendy was somehow resolved, but now Gajeel the Iron Dragon Slayer has appeared! Can you break through his iron defense?
8301310.name: The Strength of Iron

8301311.desc: Stumbling through a rift into Grand Gaia, the Sky Dragon Slayer Wendy lashes a gust of wind at you upon seeing you... Don't get blown off your feet!
8301311.name: A Windy Fight

8301312.desc: Gajeel and Wendy have decided to challenge you together! Will you be able to withstand this fearsome combination of iron and sky magic?
8301312.name: Iron Covered Skies

8301320.desc: The Black Wizard Zeref does not appear to harbor any ill will towards you However, an eerie force suddenly attacks you when you approach him!
8301320.name: The Black Wizard

8301321.desc: The great black dragon Acnologia suddenly appears from the rift! Put an end to his rampage before he destroys Grand Gaia with his overwhelming power!
8301321.name: Dragon of Destruction

8301351.desc: After hearing from the town guard, Linlin, Bjorn, and an unenthused Kitsu begin their search for the missing children. Will they pick up the trail?
8301351.name: Snowy Sojourn

8301352.desc: Meanwhile, a cheerful girl named Annette lends her aid to the effort! This ought to be a blast!
8301352.name: Whispers in the Cave

8301353.desc: A shadowy figure appears out of nowhere and strikes at the party! How will they resolve this?
8301353.name: A Shadowy Meeting

8301361.desc: Nick and Silvie have arrived in the outskirts of the town. Will they find what they seek here?
8301361.name: On the Road Again

8301362.desc: A reunion of Silvie and Haido, with Annette in tow! Can they convince Nick to their cause?
8301362.name: A Warm Reunion

8301363.desc: The party tries to cheer Nick up, but a shadow from the past pays them another unwanted visit
8301363.name: Chasing Shadows

8301371.desc: Krampus, a spirit of vengeance given life by Nick's despair, threatens to destroy everything he stood for. Banish Krampus and save everyone's Winter!
8301371.name: Battle For Everyone's Winter

8301372.desc: A reimagination of Krampus is somehow given life by some mysterious force. Banish Krampus once again, for good this time!
8301372.name: [Hard] Battle For Everyone's Winter

8301381.desc: Test the extent of your knowledge of Grand Gaia, hosted by Rizky! Expect many lore related questions!
8301381.name: Grand Gaia Trivia ft. Rizky

8301382.desc: How well do you know Grand Gaia? Sit down, join the challenge and let Shaly be the judge of that!
8301382.name: Grand Gaia Trivia ft. Shaly

8301391.desc: You arrive in New Cravich, a high-tech city that has recently announced a public "restructuring" of its sentient androids.
8301391.name: Sneaking Suspicions

8301392.desc: Vektor takes you along to infiltrate the Corporation's headquarters to rescue the android Galene from destruction.
8301392.name: Hacking for Her

8301393.desc: The door unlocks, indicating Galene is still active. You and Vektor head into the facility, hoping to get ahead of security.
8301393.name: Beating the System

8301394.desc: Galene, a highly specialized military android, recalls the last few months of her "life" prior to dismantlement
8301394.name: End-of-Life

8301395.desc: Having rejected her fate, Galene tries to break out of confinement. A certain young techpunk on her mind gives her courage.
8301395.name: Overriding Protocol

8301396.desc: The door unlocks, indicating Vektor's presence. Surprised and overcome with emotion, Galene sets a course to meet him...
8301396.name: You In My Sights

8301397.desc: Vektor and Galene finally reunite, but the Corporation has them in its grip. Will they break through this unfeeling tyranny?
8301397.name: Beyond Machine

8301398.desc: Knowing that Vektor and Galene are safe for now, you decide to get to the bottom of the Corporation's sinister AI.
8301398.name: [Hard] Forced Shutdown

8301399.desc: With the antifield disabled, your powers return. You send Vektor and Galene away, and prepare for a night of scrapping.
8301399.name: [Farm] Scrapping Security

8301400.desc:
DO NOT ENTER!
Enter Frontier Rift via Randall Survey Office.
Please refer to our official channels for more information.
8301400.name: Raug Phantasm Lv. 4

8301401.desc: Help Auberi to solve the puzzle and summon the Rainbow Crystal!
8301401.name: The Last Judgment

8301402.desc: Help Auberi to solve the puzzle and summon the Rainbow Crystal!
8301402.name: The Last Judgment

8301403.desc: Help Auberi to solve the puzzle and summon the Rainbow Crystal!
8301403.name: The Last Judgment

8301404.desc: Help Auberi to solve the puzzle and summon the Rainbow Crystal!
8301404.name: The Last Judgment

8301405.desc: Help Auberi to solve the puzzle and summon the Rainbow Crystal!
8301405.name: The Last Judgment

8301406.desc: Help Auberi to solve the puzzle and summon the Rainbow Crystal!
8301406.name: The Last Judgment

8301407.desc: Help Auberi to solve the puzzle and summon the Rainbow Crystal!
8301407.name: The Last Judgment

8301408.desc: Help Auberi to solve the puzzle and summon the Rainbow Crystal!
8301408.name: The Last Judgment

8301409.desc: Help Auberi to solve the puzzle and summon the Rainbow Crystal!
8301409.name: The Last Judgment

8301410.desc: Help Auberi to solve the puzzle and summon the Rainbow Crystal!
8301410.name: The Last Judgment

8301411.desc: Help Auberi to solve the puzzle and summon the Rainbow Crystal!
8301411.name: The Last Judgment

8301412.desc: Help Auberi to solve the puzzle and summon the Rainbow Crystal!
8301412.name: The Last Judgment

8301413.desc: Help Auberi to solve the puzzle and summon the Rainbow Crystal!
8301413.name: The Last Judgment

8301414.desc: Help Auberi to solve the puzzle and summon the Rainbow Crystal!
8301414.name: The Last Judgment

8301415.desc: Marianne needs your help to tame the Crystal Gods!
8301415.name: Colored Gods

8301420.desc: A mysterious world of ghouls and humans exists, and in this world human flesh is food for ghouls. Yet not all ghouls are enemies of man...
8301420.name: Scars

8301421.desc: In the depths of an abandoned church, a Gourmet hungers for more than victory...
8301421.name: Gourmet

8301422.desc: The climax of the battle has arrived! Will you see victory - or will you be gnawed on in the throes of defeat?
8301422.name: Crazy Gourmet [Daily]

8301430.desc: Feora takes a walk on the wild side, but where nature is concerned, it's best not to kick things at random.
8301430.name: Hornet's Nest

8301431.desc: The strange man, Hyshka, investigates the woods with a moody teenager and finds something far more disturbing
8301431.name: Way Off Base

8301432.desc: Hyshka catches up with Feora before she can wreak more havoc in the woods, but as they say, there's always a bigger one...
8301432.name: Natural Disaster

8301433.desc: As a one-woman Woodland Patrol, Feora is eager to lend her bat to the task. Help a girl out before she steps in another nest!
8301433.name: Clean-Up Crew

8301441.desc: Do you know what a Chinese Red-headed Centipede can do? You'll find out soon enough.
8301441.name: Ghoul

8301442.desc: This scream-soaked journey has come to its end. Hope you're hungry, because it's time to eat.
8301442.name: Power

8301461.desc: Do you know what a Chinese Red-headed Centipede can do? You'll find out soon enough.
8301461.name: Ghoul [Daily]

8301470.desc: The new Vessels each obtained their awesome but terrifying powers abruptly, but they have yet to find out how.
8301470.name: The Shards of Power

8301471.desc: Hetepheres imbues herself with incredible nimbleness in the fight against the inexplicable undead.
8301471.name: Divine Resonance

8301472.desc: Hetepheres learns about the origins of the Vessels' powers from Aesys, who reveals herself to be one of the Old Gods.
8301472.name: The Old Gods' Legacies

8301480.desc: Some of the Vessels are more concerned with why they were chosen for their new powers, instead of how.
8301480.name: Pangs of the Past

8301481.desc: The Vessel of Death unleashes his powers upon the undead, while struggling with the unknown visions assailing him.
8301481.name: A Stranger's Memories

8301482.desc: Rahotep encounters a darkness that promises to answer his existential questions... and he confronts it without a shadow of fear.
8301482.name: In the Face of Darkness

8301490.desc: Aesys has followed the horde of undead to a besieged city, in hopes of finding the Vessel of her late husband.
8301490.name: In Sickness and In Death

8301491.desc: Logic and hope war within Aesys, as she begins to suspect that her husband has not come back as himself. Yet it is so much easier to cling onto blind denial...
8301491.name: The Doom of Love

8301492.desc: Aesys relives the trauma of witnessing the death of her heart.
8301492.name: A Wife's Pain

8301500.desc: Fate is cruel, even to gods.
8301500.name: The Scorpion-Lord

8301520.desc: Lydia brings an excitable Yin-Yin into Calavera City proper, but they get more than just sights and sounds.
8301520.name: All-You-Can-Eat

8301521.desc: The crackling specters return with a vengeance.
8301521.name: Electric Boogaloo

8301522.desc: Yin-Yin jumps into the fray, but the corpse-girl has a better use for that nose of hers.
8301522.name: Jaunting Forth

8301523.desc: Hot on the trail of the flaming spirit, Lydia and Yin-Yin are drawn into an event of their unlifetime.
8301523.name: Winner Takes All

8301524.desc: The fiery spirit has a little proposition to double the odds for a rematch.
8301524.name: Double Up!

8301525.desc: Can't get enough of that sugar rush? Indulge yourself!
8301525.name: Sweet Tooth

8301530.desc: Every year, spirits return to the living world to partake in offerings, but a anomalous visitor raises some concerns.
8301530.name: Grave Hopping

8301531.desc: Having "rescued" the strange corpse-girl, Lydia has to deal with the aftermath of her gorging
8301531.name: Green with Gorging

8301532.desc: Who knew taking other people's food could be such a hair-raising experience?
8301532.name: A Real Shocker

8301533.desc: The mobs don't let up, prompting Lydia to propose a change in location...
8301533.name: Concessions

8301541.desc: A radiant and omniscient light lies beyond the gate. Could it be the Rainbow Goddess? As you move forth, you're enveloped in a familiar warmth....
8301541.name: Return of the Goddess

8301550.desc: As masks come off and loyalties grow murky, night begins to fall upon the gods and the Vessel of Horus
8301550.name: Night Falls

8301551.desc: Neferet's journey to the ancient land of the gods to beseech their aid comes to an end as a decrepit shrine looms before her.
8301551.name: Mysteries of the Gods

8301552.desc: Pleased with her prowess, the mysterious woman reveals herself, and the truths to come
8301552.name: The First Truth

8301553.desc: Ptah is unwilling to save humans from their hubris, but Thoth argues in their favor. Just then, a familiar face appears
8301553.name: Shadowed Sun

8301560.desc: An otherworldly visitor bearing the likeness of a Lion has arrived on the plains of Grand Gaia. Who exactly are they?
8301560.name: The Savage Lion

8301561.desc: For inexplicable reasons, memories of your fight against Baragan seem to have blurred. The Savage Lion might be stronger than you originally remembered
8301561.name: [Hard] The Savage Lion

8301570.desc: The Lady of Horizons meets the Goddess of Trickery. How will the long standing grudge between the two pan out?
8301570.name: An Uneasy Reunion

8301571.desc: The Bringer of Chaos finally reveals himself.
8301571.name: Burning Dread

8301572.desc: Gathering their remaining strength, the Vessels prepare to defy the fate that was ordained by the God-King.
8301572.name: Fates In Our Hands

8301580.desc: Calavera City is a bright and beautiful place, filled with nooks, crannies, and an abundance of abandoned alleyways to explore.
8301580.name: Abandoned Alleyway

8301581.desc: The path diverges, and from a distance you see a glowing light up a set of stairs.
8301581.name: Crossroad Stairs

8301582.desc: The path diverges, and down these slopes you hear strange voices echoing all around the walls.
8301582.name: Crossroad Slope

8301583.desc: A line of floating fires surround you, darting about as if daring you to catch them.
8301583.name: Fickle Fire

8301584.desc: Water droplets flick out at you from every corner in defiant playfulness.
8301584.name: Willful Water

8301585.desc: Dark motes dance before you, dipping into the shadows like an inkwell.
8301585.name: Devilish Darkness

8301586.desc: All around you, clumps of earth rise and fall as if responding to the arcane.
8301586.name: Energetic Earth

8301587.desc: The sound of thunder reverberates around you in an almost playful manner.
8301587.name: Teasing Thunder

8301588.desc: The lilting hum of light motes draws you toward this open space.
8301588.name: Lyrical Light

8301640.desc: An otherworldly visitor carrying the chill winds of death has arrived on the plains of Grand Gaia. Who exactly are they?
8301640.name: The Curse Master

8301641.desc: For inexplicable reasons, memories of your fight against Elhaza seem to have blurred. The Curse Master might be stronger than you originally remembered
8301641.name: [Hard] The Curse Master

8301650.desc: An otherworldly visitor of an unknown, robotic nature has arrived on the plains of Grand Gaia. Who exactly are they?
8301650.name: The Warmonger

8301651.desc: For inexplicable reasons, memories of your fight against Zaad seem to have blurred. The Warmonger might be stronger than you originally remembered
8301651.name: [Hard] The Warmonger

8301690.desc: A dark and evil force that once overwhelmed the fabled realm of Valhalla has begun its corruption of Grand Gaia. Can you defeat the Herald of Yggdrasil?
8301690.name: The Herald of Yggdrasil

8301691.desc: One of the most respected goddesses of Valhalla has descended upon Grand Gaia! Dare you challenge Frigg and prove your mettle against her powers of prescience?
8301691.name: The Prescient Goddess, Frigg

8301692.desc: As chief among the gods in Valhalla, Odin is a mighty warrior who protects Valhalla fiercely and as such, should not be taken lightly. Will you prevail in a trial against him?
8301692.name: Creation God Odin

8301700.desc: Bountiful experience, karma, zel, and other various rewards awaits you! Complete this mission once a day and reap the rewards!
8301700.name: Myth Paradise

8301710.desc: An otherworldly visitor bearing the likeliness of a jester has appeared on the plains of Grand Gaia. Who exactly are they?
8301710.name: The Illusionist

8301711.desc: For inexplicable reasons, memories of your fight against Melfel seem to have blurred. The Illusionist might be stronger than you originally remembered
8301711.name: [Hard] The Illusionist

8301731.desc: Take on the Humanoid Typhoon in this challenge dungeon! Will you be blown away?
8301731.name: Vash the Stampede

8301741.desc: Uh-oh! The bandits brought friends? lots of them! Can you keep up?
8301741.name: Bandits, Bandits Everywhere

8301742.desc: A steely-eyed villain is prepared to bring our heroes to the brink of despair. Will you succumb?
8301742.name: Meeting Legato

8301751.desc: Your focus will be tested against this heartless man. Time to buckle up!
8301751.name: Legato Bluesummers

8301761.desc: What a shock! Can you put an end to Knives' nefarious plans?
8301761.name: An Electrifying Appearance

8301762.desc: It's time for the electrifying climax! Go for it and blow them away!
8301762.name: A Thunderous Ending

8301771.desc: The final challenge is before you! But you might have met your match! Time to see where you stand!
8301771.name: Millions Knives

8301781.desc: Time to grab some sweet loot! Think you're up to the task?
8301781.name: Bounty Searcher

8301782.desc: Want more awesome stuff? You'll have to pry it out of their hands!
8301782.name: Bounty Hunter

8301791.desc: Bountiful experience, karma, zel, and other various rewards awaits you! Complete this mission once a day and reap the rewards!
8301791.name: Routine Bounty

8302001.desc: Now that you've met the guardian of the tower, you start to feel less confident about this mission. What else lurks in the darkness?
8302001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 11-20

8303001.desc: So far so good, nothing you can't handle as of yet. But the spooky howls coming from the higher levels of the tower are something you can't ignore...
8303001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 21-30

8304001.desc: What's that?! A dark shadow just flashed past you. Or was it just your imagination? Stay alert, Summoner.
8304001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 31-40

8305001.desc: How many floors has it been? It's getting darker and the rain isn't stopping. Gleaming eyes are watching you from behind the shadows...
8305001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 41-50

8306001.desc: Watch out for the beasts and monsters, they haven't had a decent meal in ages... Let your guard down and you might not live to see the sun rise again.
8306001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 51-60

8307001.desc: Your breathing seems heavier than before. Are you getting tired from the climb, or is the guardian of the tower pushing you to your limits?
8307001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 61-70

8308001.desc: He is hot on your heels, catching you at every turn and landing. You need to hurry! The ominous aura filling the air is getting thicker by the minute.
8308001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 71-80

8309001.desc: You can't let him get in your way now! You've come so far, the truth waiting to be unraveled is just a reach away...
8309001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 81-90

8309980.desc: Our favorite friends are back for a new challenge! Are you down for it?
8309980.name: Level 1: Game on

8309981.desc: This time our favorite friends bring their own guards for the challenge!
8309981.name: Level 2: Unusual Adventure

8309982.desc: What is going on? Nothing works against Grind Burny!
8309982.name: Level 3: Refined Deception

8310001.desc: You've reached the top of the tower! Or...have you? It's too dark to see, but you can clearly sense a strong power beckoning in the darkness...
8310001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 91-100

8310061.desc: A piece of the ancient lands of Athensphere still drifts in the Vortex, burning in fire and smoke.
8310061.name: Ocular Ordnance - Battle 1

8310062.desc: An endless destruction continues in the fiery lands, while a destructive weapon reaps chaos throughout the land.
8310062.name: Ocular Ordnance - Battle 2

8310063.desc: Can anyone stop the fiery destruction once and for all, and restore what remains of the Athensphere?
8310063.name: Ocular Ordnance - Battle 3

8310212.desc: Seeing how much chaos he and his friends can cause, Nice Burny leads them on a rampage to cause greater chaos to whiny summoners. KEKEKEKEKEKE!
8310212.name: Burny & Friends UNLEASHED! Lv. 2

8310301.desc: As the seasons change, the winds of fate swoosh over the lands welcoming a brand new year.
8310301.name: Prosperity Fields Lv. 1

8310302.desc: Auspicious creatures come out to play, challenge and brawl.
8310302.name: Status Brawl Lv. 2

8310303.desc: The short lifespan of man is but a rush of aroma and color. Only those of ripest age can be said to have enjoyed the fruits of life.
8310303.name: Longevity Scuffle Lv. 3

8310304.desc: A new dawn awaits the those who face the sun and allow the wings of destiny to carry them to greater heights.
8310304.name: Happiness Shrine Lv4

8311000.desc: There is nothing more worth fighting for than justice. She will not hesitate to launch her missiles at anything she deems unrighteous.
8311000.name: Flames of Justice Lv. 1

8311001.desc: Wait... What the cursed knight has been fighting to guard wasn't the tower? What he was trying to protect was... Wh-What's that?!
8311001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 101-110

8311002.desc: As Leon's influence grew, he gathered a band of thieves who shared the same ideals as his own. Help the weak, and crush the strong. Steal from the rich to aid the poor.
8311002.name: Band of Thieves

8311006.desc: Hero of the Agni Empire, Vargas' strength and blazing sword lit the flame in the people's hearts to believe that they had a chance against the gods.
8311006.name: Hero of Agni Lv. 1

8311010.desc: Once a week, lunar shifts above affect the emotional spectrum of bulbs. The fields glow red from the emergence of Fire Bulbs, buzzed and excited.
8311010.name: Crimson Fields

8311999.desc: Frustrated that they're always being picked on, Burny and friends set out on a rampage to create chaos. MWAHAHAHA!
8311999.name: Burny & Friends UNLEASHED! Lv. 1

8312000.desc: When she is angered, only destruction awaits. Stand in her way and be prepared to get blown away.
8312000.name: Flames of Justice Lv. 2

8312001.desc: It only took the monster a single strike to take down the knight you fought so hard against?! Are you sure you can take on the monster?
8312001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 111-120

8312002.desc: As the band grew stronger and larger, Leon now had an army that reaped through the regions stamping down on the corrupt rich and powerful, making himself their number one enemy within the Agni Empire.
8312002.name: Undaunted Uprising

8312006.desc: His immense powers were feared even by the gods. Even long after he left the empire, he was remembered by its people as the legendary swordsman of Agni.
8312006.name: Hero of Agni Lv. 2

8312010.desc: Once a week, lunar shifts above affect the emotional spectrum of bulbs. The fields turn humid from emergence of Water Bulbs, wet and soggy.
8312010.name: Misty Fields

8312999.desc: As night falls, the shine of the moon lights up the darkness, enticing curious creatures to come out to play.
8312999.name: Moonlit Path Lv. 1

8313000.desc: Sparks fly as her war rockets blow her enemies away. Her passion for justice burns stronger than ever.
8313000.name: Flames of Justice Lv. 3

8313001.desc: Now that Xenon is injured, you're the only one who can contain the monster. Hurry, before it escapes the tower!
8313001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 121-130

8313002.desc: As he finally claimed the territory of the ruined Agni Empire, Leon faced officials, angry gods, and Summoners charging up his doorstep. Believing in equality among men, the thief of justice faced all odds with his cunning and wits.
8313002.name: The Reign Over Agni

8313010.desc: Once a week, lunar shifts above affect the emotional spectrum of bulbs. The fields shine from emergence of Earth Bulbs, lush and green.
8313010.name: Moss Fields

8313100.desc: This summer's most popular trip takes you to the wonderful Southern beaches! Sunscreen and monster repellant sold separately.
8313100.name: Destination: Sandy Jaunt

8313101.desc: Sennie and Chryssa, two residents at water's edge, decide to explore inland where no sea-dweller has gone before
8313101.name: Hitting the Beach

8313102.desc: The once lively Central Province is now little more than dust and ruin -- but surely there's something to see regardless.
8313102.name: How To Ruin A Day

8313103.desc: As the girls settle down near the Vale, tales of the old beasts come to the fore as they settle down for the night
8313103.name: Fae-rly Terrifying

8313104.desc: New on the list, the mysterious North has opened up for an exclusive look at the Vale! A faery fun opportunity for all ages!
8313104.name: Destination: Forest Frolic

8313999.desc: As the moon reaches its fullest in the night sky, a mysterious gathering has begun. All manner of creatures are drawn to the beauty in the sky.
8313999.name: Full Moon Gathering Lv. 2

8314001.desc: Oh no! You lost sight of the monster! Where is it? There's no time to waste... You need to track it down before it can ambush you!
8314001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 131-140

8314010.desc: Once a week, lunar shifts above affect the emotional spectrum of bulbs. The fields shine from emergence of Thunder Bulbs, flashing with electric rhythm.
8314010.name: Static Fields

8314999.desc: Mesmerized and enthralled by the bright yet silent moon, curious creatures begin dancing to the mystical feeling in the air.
8314999.name: Moonlight Dance Lv. 3

8315001.desc: The darkness is putting you at a great disadvantage, but you can hear the monster's heartbeat from a distance. Wait, was that your own heartbeat instead?
8315001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 141-150

8315010.desc: Once a week, lunar shifts above affect the emotional spectrum of bulbs. The fields shine from emergence of Light Bulbs, bright and luminous.
8315010.name: Radiant Fields

8316001.desc: The continuous climb and seemingly endless battles have taken a toll on you, but your mission is not over. Xenon is pinning his hopes on you, Summoner.
8316001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 151-160

8316010.desc: Once a week, lunar shifts above affects the emotional spectrum of bulbs. The fields emanate a purple glow from the emergence of Dark Bulbs, morbid and desolate.
8316010.name: Shadow Fields

8317001.desc: Is that the best you can do? You need to muster more energy and power to complete this mission! Pull yourself together and charge forth!
8317001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 161-170

8318001.desc: The monster seems to be getting stronger and stronger. Can you keep up? If you give up now, it's not going to leave a nice impression on your record...
8318001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 171-180

8319001.desc: There's no time to rest! The monster must be getting exhausted too, this is your chance to attack! Did you lose sight of it again?
8319001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 181-190

8320001.desc: It has been a long, tough fight. You're so close to completing your mission! You're not going to give up now, are you?
8320001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 191-200

8320061.desc: A sunken piece of Athensphere that although filled with treasure & valuable history, still houses many dangers. Only the brave dare to traverse into the unknown depths.
8320061.name: Aquatic Carnage - Battle 1

8320062.desc: In the quiet waters of the depths, a ferocious carnage still rages. No one is safe when diving into this unknown territory.
8320062.name: Aquatic Carnage - Battle 2

8320063.desc: Can the echoes of mayhem and despair of the deep be finally eradicated? Will the lost treasures and history of Athensphere be finally retrieved?
8320063.name: Aquatic Carnage - Battle 3

8320112.desc: In the snowy outlands, something stirs the emotions of man and beasts alike.
8320112.name: Frost Blitz Lv. 2

8320113.desc: The ice and snow glister with a soft mystic light from the sun. The glades seem a little unusual this year.
8320113.name: Frost Blitz Lv. 3

8320114.desc: The harsh cold air gets stronger, the snow gets thicker. Your curious heart wanders deeper.
8320114.name: Frost Blitz Lv. 4

8320115.desc: In a distant land, bright lights glimmer and melodious jingling fills the air.
8320115.name: Frozen Dreamland Lv. 2

8320116.desc: A sudden snowstorm picks up as you trudge your way towards a nearby castle. Curiously, it seems to be nudging you forward.
8320116.name: Frozen Dreamland Lv. 3

8320117.desc: As you approach the arctic castle, a shadowy figure watches over you from the top of one of its towers. What surprises await ahead?
8320117.name: Frozen Dreamland Lv. 4

8320118.desc: In the shattered remains of Nick's workshop, two very different creatures come to life. What could be the story behind their magical awakening?
8320118.name: Cold Awakenings

8320119.desc: A wandering figure tries to make sense of a chaotic world while a lone sentinel continues to find corpses. Who will find who first?
8320119.name: Path of Broken Promises

8320120.desc: After much searching, Silvie finally catches up with Nick. However, how will Haido's interruption affect the party's delicate situation?
8320120.name: A Tear-Wrapped Reunion

8321000.desc: Cool and dignified, she bows to no one but her trusty Gatling gun which she has entrusted her life to.
8321000.name: Waves of Fury Lv. 1

8321001.desc: Xenon & Estia revisit their past of wandering the wilderness together, after escaping from their burning kingdom in search of allies to recruit...
8321001.name: Reminiscence

8321006.desc: Beautiful yet strong, Selena was admired by many for leading the Savat people of the Sama Kingdom to countless victorious battles.
8321006.name: Heroine of Sama Lv. 1

8322000.desc: Known as the Gun Lady, she never lets her guard or her gun down. When it comes to the quick draw, she is second to none.
8322000.name: Waves of Fury Lv. 2

8322001.desc: In the following months after escaping the gods, they survived and adapted to danger, slowly forging a special relationship against all odds that lay before them.
8322001.name: Lost Innocence

8322006.desc: Refusing the call from her kingdom, Selena instead wielded her treasured sword Lexida and cut down god after god to rescue the masses.
8322006.name: Heroine of Sama Lv. 2

8323000.desc: It's no longer a matter of winning or losing. She wants revenge and she wants it fast. She has no time for those who can't keep up.
8323000.name: Waves of Fury Lv. 3

8323001.desc: Defeated but finally freed, the couple wonders if their bond is still as strong as it was in the past.
8323001.name: Duo of Virtue

8330061.desc: As Athensphere crumbles, its peaceful sanctums where the first demi-gods were once created plunge into chaos.
8330061.name: Sanctum Scrimmage - Battle 1

8330062.desc: Will the holy relics of the past lying within the holy grounds be destroyed in the fire of destruction, or be salvaged by the brave?
8330062.name: Sanctum Scrimmage - Battle 2

8330063.desc: As the skirmishes in the sanctuary carry on, a determined soul vows to rid the holy grounds of this invasive rampage.
8330063.name: Sanctum Scrimmage - Battle 3

8331000.desc: She doesn't have the slightest clue about her past, but she knows one thing well and clear. She needs to get stronger.
8331000.name: Nature's Wild Child Lv. 1

8331006.desc: Picking up the Sacred Pike Drevas, Lance gave up his roots as a noble of the Principality of Vriksha to pursue greater skill and power.
8331006.name: Hero of Vriksha Lv. 1

8332000.desc: The mountains are more dangerous than they look, but nothing will stop her from sharpening her senses as well as her claws.
8332000.name: Nature's Wild Child Lv. 2

8332006.desc: Lance stood up against the gods, but he was not alone. He had his awakened Demon Pike Drevas, which now held the powers of World Tree Altro.
8332006.name: Hero of Vriksha Lv. 2

8333000.desc: "Never underestimate a cat," she always warns, and those who cross her only realize it when they feel her claws dig in.
8333000.name: Nature's Wild Child Lv. 3

8340061.desc: The skies thunder with fury as the augmentation wars carry on through the forsaken lands of Athensphere.
8340061.name: Invasion Apex - Battle 1

8340062.desc: The defense forces push forward upon the high grounds as Gazia and his iron army concentrate at the peak.
8340062.name: Invasion Apex - Battle 2

8340063.desc: The final frontier looms ever closer as the defensive forces of Athensphere clash with the enemy in an electrified fury.
8340063.name: Invasion Apex - Battle 3

8341000.desc: Being able to prophesize, the only way she could keep going despite the dreadful war was to smile and keep fighting.
8341000.name: Bolts and Bombs Lv. 1

8341006.desc: Eze trained and fought hard as a  warrior and was rewarded with the Thunder Sword Batootha, which gave him the destructive power of thunder.
8341006.name: Hero of Atharva Lv. 1

8341999.desc: A storm has been brewing across the vast skies of Grand Gaia, and where there is a storm, thunder is bound to follow.
8341999.name: Thunder Turnout Lv. 1

8342000.desc: Though she lost her memory, she didn't lose her spark and will to fight, her grin only widened as she got stronger.
8342000.name: Bolts and Bombs Lv. 2

8342006.desc: Eze tore down the gods with his Thunder Sword Batootha and his superior speed, rescuing Goddess Emilia and the masses during the great war.
8342006.name: Hero of Atharva Lv. 2

8342999.desc: Do you hear the thunder? It's coming for you. They're coming for you. Can you thrive above the lightning, or will you kneel to their bolts of power?
8342999.name: Thunder Turnout Lv. 2

8343000.desc: A fortune-teller knows that there's no way to change fate. The only way to win is to laugh and make merry. Fight-oh!
8343000.name: Bolts and Bombs Lv. 3

8350011.desc: The melodies of Fire, Water and Light echo down the great halls of the infinite abyss.
8350011.name: Hymn of Dusk

8350012.desc: The melodies of Earth, Thunder and Darkness echo down the great halls of the infinite abyss.
8350012.name: Hymn of Dawn

8350061.desc: As the cries of war creep nearer, peace is broken, and the tranquillity of the lands is disturbed.
8350061.name: Tranquil Turmoil - Battle 1

8350062.desc: A battle breaks out on the Faithlorn Fields of Athensphere. Neither the old nor young shall be spared.
8350062.name: Tranquil Turmoil - Battle 2

8350063.desc: Gentle souls begin rising up in desperation to bring back order to the lands.
8350063.name: Tranquil Turmoil - Battle 3

8350401.desc: As the spring solstice approaches, furry creatures come out to play.
8350401.name: Easter Fanfare Lv. 1

8350402.desc: Furry creatures bear gifts and little surprises for travelers from distant lands.
8350402.name: Easter Fanfare Lv. 2

8350403.desc: Gifts and surprises don't come with ease, furry creatures live to tease.
8350403.name: Easter Fanfare Lv. 3

8350404.desc: Celebrate the joy of spring time with even more furry creatures than before!
8350404.name: Easter Fanfare Lv.4

8351000.desc: While others struggle on the ground, she soars through the sky to wherever the light reaches, and fights for those who seek freedom.
8351000.name: The Holy Sky Mech Lv. 1

8351006.desc: Gifted with extraordinary skills, Atro was known as the "Sword Saint" for his brilliant technique with the legendary Light Sword Urias.
8351006.name: Hero of La Veda Lv. 1

8352000.desc: If death can't stop her, nothing will. As long as there is a ray of light, she'll trace it down, even to Gaia's end.
8352000.name: The Holy Sky Mech Lv. 2

8352006.desc: When the gods destroyed the monastery he grew up in, he drew his sword and unleashed the unearthly powers of Urias, going all out against the gods.
8352006.name: Hero of La Veda Lv. 2

8353000.desc: Stronger, higher, faster. Whoever said the sky's the limit obviously never met Vanila. To this airborne warrior, the sky is but the starting line.
8353000.name: The Holy Sky Mech Lv. 3

8360021.desc:
I... I opened a portal to the Dark Tower and I couldn't control the accursed.
Keep it under control and you shall be rewarded.
8360021.name: Trial No. X1

8360041.desc: This mock unit was supposedly widely feared and known far throughout the East. Are you up for the challenge?
8360041.name: Trial No. X3

8360051.desc: Ive finally done it!! My research has led me to this man of great importance. There is much I would like to ask him but first, would you like a challenge?
8360051.name: Trial No. X4

8360061.desc: As Athensphere was torn apart and condemned into the abyss of the Vortex, an eternal conflict continues beneath the fissure it once stood upon.
8360061.name: Chasm Conflict - Battle 1

8360062.desc: Though there is much to salvage of the once mighty lands, a ferocious creation wreaks havoc and kills anyone who dares enter the domain.
8360062.name: Chasm Conflict - Battle 2

8360063.desc: From above the chasm, screams and growls of victims and demons echo on below. Can anyone step up and bring the destruction to an end?
8360063.name: Chasm Conflict - Battle 3

8360503.desc: Follow Fang into Xie'Jing's abyss to search for Fei in order to rescue him...
8360503.name: Abyss Rescue Lv. 3

8360504.desc: Can you help Fang defeat Xie'Jing once and for all, and snatch Fei out of her clutches?
8360504.name: Abyss Rescue Lv. 4

8360505.desc: A past adversary, a terrible memory. Will they be able to finally exorcise this vile foe?
8360505.name: Haunting Dreams

8360506.desc: A young girl searching for her parents meets a dashing male amidst the shadows. Is this what they call fate?
8360506.name: Dark Shadows

8360507.desc: The darkest hour is just before the dawn. To be able to see the light, one must face their darkest demons!
8360507.name: Dawn Breaking

8361000.desc: The half-demon daughter of a dark lord is always seeking a thrill by feeding her restless blood. Battle Maidens? Sounds like fun.
8361000.name: Demon Blade of the Dark Lv. 1

8361006.desc: As a cavalry leader's son, Magress was a talented young knight. Triggered by his defeat to his father, he honed his skills and soon became the strongest in Bariura.
8361006.name: Hero of Bariura Lv. 1

8362000.desc: Nothing bores her more than incompetent, weak fighters. The demon in her is telling her to fight to survive, and devour to succeed.
8362000.name: Demon Blade of the Dark Lv. 2

8362006.desc: Wielding a gigantic lance, he could effortlessly pierce through the thickest of armor. Even the gods couldn't stand in his way.
8362006.name: Hero of Bariura Lv. 2

8363000.desc: She doesn't care if a human, god, or demon stands in her way. Her demon blade will only stop for someone who excites her...but only for brief while.
8363000.name: Demon Blade of the Dark Lv. 3

8380000.desc: The gods thus granted this spirit with the burning desire to triumph in battle, making it the strongest of its kind.
8380000.name: Trial 01 - Burning Desire

8380130.desc: The lands begin to darken, covered in shadows. A mysterious aura draws the curious and the timid alike.
8380130.name: The Path Less Travelled

8381000.desc: An ancient destructive force reanimated and energized to its very limit.
8381000.name: Trial 02 - Destructive Force

8381130.desc: Evil descends into the darkened lands, haunting the timid and assaulting the unwary.
8381130.name: Demented Trails

8382000.desc: The gods gave this demon the spirit of ultimate defense, strengthened its power, and sharpened its claws.
8382000.name: Trial 03 - Ultimate Defense

8382130.desc: The lands fall into what seem like an eternal nightfall. From the twilight, demons and monsters emerge...
8382130.name: The Haunted Lands

8383000.desc: It was rumored that the beast acquired the mysterious power of a fiery barrier.
8383000.name: Trial 04 - Fiery Barrier

8383130.desc: Are you ready to face your fears and conquer the hellborn itself? Assist Ciara & Semira in defeating it!
8383130.name: Demonic Vindication

8384000.desc: And the gods said to her, all you need to do is get even angrier.
8384000.name: Trial 05 - Rage of God

8384130.desc: Demonspawn have come out to play! Free Ciara & Semira from their control, if they are even the real deal that is?
8384130.name: Hellish Possession

8385000.desc: The gods granted a powerful companion to the most unlikely of all creatures..
8385000.name: Trial 06 - Companion Vigor

8385130.desc: Behold the path of a story never told before - of a fallen knight, and his black return! Who will you face - Ciara, or her nemesis?
8385130.name: An Unwalked Crossroads

8400000.desc: As you investigate a magical laboratory, you feel a burning gaze on you. Behind you appears a mysterious figure out of thin air.
8400000.name: Magic Research Lv. 1

8400001.desc: The experienced and beautiful lady of the mage's guild is both dominant and seasoned. She attacks you as if teasing you, testing your capabilities.
8400001.name: Magic Research Lv. 2

8400002.desc: The mage laughs of someone who holds many secrets. Knowing there are more yet to be found, she prepares a unique spell for this special occasion.
8400002.name: Magic Research Lv. 3

8701600.desc: Legend has it that there was once a knight who came into his own kingdom. He would name it after a mythical land from tales of old...
8701600.name: Legends of NeoAvalon Lv. 3

8701601.desc: Arthur devoted his life to protecting NeoAvalon, but lost everything he held dear in the process. Will he continue to walk the path of the righteous?
8701601.name: Legends of NeoAvalon Lv. 4

8701602.desc: Not even kings may escape the cruelty of fate. Lost in the darkness of his own fury, Arthur crosses blades with a traveling soldier named Lancelot.
8701602.name: Legends of NeoAvalon Lv. 5

8701603.desc: Having tested each other's strength, the two warriors join forces to hunt down a mysterious and powerful artifact. Will their alliance last?
8701603.name: Legends of NeoAvalon Lv. 6

8800001.desc: You can only enter Spring Paradise once a day. There you will find the legendary guardians protecting their precious tablets...
8800001.name: Spring Paradise

8800002.desc: You can only enter Spring Paradise once a day. There you will find the legendary guardians protecting their precious tablets...
8800002.name: Spring Paradise

8800003.desc: You can only enter Spring Paradise once a day. There you will find the legendary guardians protecting their precious tablets...
8800003.name: Spring Paradise

8800004.desc: You can only enter Spring Paradise once a day. There you will find the legendary guardians protecting their precious tablets...
8800004.name: Spring Paradise

8800005.desc: You can only enter Spring Paradise once a day. There you will find the legendary guardians protecting their precious tablets...
8800005.name: Spring Paradise

8800006.desc: You can only enter Spring Paradise once a day. There you will find the legendary guardians protecting their precious tablets...
8800006.name: Spring Paradise

8800007.desc: You can only enter Spring Paradise once a day. There you will find the legendary guardians protecting their precious tablets...
8800007.name: Spring Paradise

8800008.desc: You can only enter Spring Paradise once a day. There you will find the legendary guardians protecting their precious tablets...
8800008.name: Spring Paradise

8800009.desc: You can only enter Spring Paradise once a day. There you will find the legendary guardians protecting their precious tablets...
8800009.name: Spring Paradise

8800010.desc: You can only enter Spring Paradise once a day. There you will find the legendary guardians protecting their precious tablets...
8800010.name: Spring Paradise

8800011.desc: You can only enter Spring Paradise once a day. There you will find the legendary guardians protecting their precious tablets...
8800011.name: Spring Paradise

8800012.desc: You can only enter Spring Paradise once a day. There you will find the legendary guardians protecting their precious tablets...
8800012.name: Spring Paradise

9000001.desc: No one knows what Noel does in his lab. Thus, one feels no surprise when told that an infectous virus threatens to turn into a full outbreak.
9000001.name: Pandemic - Secure

9000002.desc: Just what is this virus made of? Even inorganic constructs fall prey to it.
9000002.name: Pandemic - Ground Zero

9010001.desc: The mercenaries have prepared well for invasions. Be ready for the enemy to strike first and counter them with style!
9010001.name: Panache

9104200.desc: Using his machines and dark rites, Merlin is attempting to bring back something, or someone, to his world... He had better not be disturbed!
9104200.name: Setting up the Plan Lv. 1

9104201.desc: Using his machines and dark rites, Merlin is attempting to bring back something, or someone, to his world... He had better not be disturbed!
9104201.name: Setting up the Plan Lv. 2

20000200.desc: The North Hall is noticeably more opulent than the rest of the tomb.
20000200.name: North Hall: Foyer

20000201.desc: Deeper into the North Hall, the bounty of a lifetime awaits...
20000201.name: North Hall: Inner Chamber

20000210.desc: Behind a locked door in the East Hall, an ancient tome patiently awaits its next guest.
20000210.name: East Hall: Bronze

20000211.desc: The false wall in the East Hall's secret room reveals another chamber...
20000211.name: East Hall: Silver

20000212.desc: The East Hall's final?and perhaps even fatal?challenge looms before Renatus and Nimrah.
20000212.name: East Hall: Gold

20000220.desc: In the South Hall, Renatus stumbles upon an underground cellar hiding its own little secret.
20000220.name: South Hall: Cellar

20000230.desc: With the tome at full strength, Renatus and Nimrah must contend with its "missing" owner...
20000230.name: West Hall: Rotunda

20000901.desc: Deimos awakens in the paradise of his old gods, but not everything is as it seems...
20000901.name: Before the Gates

20000902.desc: The void creatures continue their assault upon this ascended paradise.
20000902.name: Wave of Terror

20000903.desc: The ranks are thinning out...for now. Keep up the defense!
20000903.name: Breakthrough

20000904.desc: Deimos resolves to defend the Golden City, as is his divine duty.
20000904.name: Bound By Duty

20000905.desc: The final wave has arrived, and with it, the promise of victory.
20000905.name: The Final Push

20000906.desc: Patrol the City's boundaries and dispatch any vile intruders attempting to breach the gate.
20000906.name: Gate Sentry

20000907.desc: The intruders grow bolder and stronger with every assault. Destroy them before they breach the gates!
20000907.name: City Sentinel

20000908.desc: A powerful darkness ripples out of the distortion in space. Ready your weapons!
20000908.name: Eye of the Storm

20000909.desc: The enemy comes upon us again this day. Defend the Golden City!
20000909.name: Against the Darkness

20001000.desc: Defend the golem. That's all you need to do. How hard could it be?
20001000.name: Welcome to Paradise - Stage 1

20001001.desc: These natives aren't very strong, hold your ground. This won't take long.
20001001.name: Welcome to Paradise - Stage 2

20001002.desc: Almost there! The golem is almost fully charged!
20001002.name: Welcome to Paradise - Stage 3

20001003.desc: The golem's gone mad! Who would've thought? But there's always a Plan B
20001003.name: Time for Plan B

20001004.desc: Who would've thought? A second golem Here we go again!
20001004.name: Halfway There - Stage 1

20001005.desc: Driven back time and again, but they won't stop coming back! Keep the natives away!
20001005.name: Halfway There - Stage 2

20001006.desc: Just a little longer. Hopefully this golem doesn't go wild like the last one did.
20001006.name: Halfway There - Stage 3

20001007.desc: Of course it goes mad. This one looks tougher than the last. Be on your guard!
20001007.name: So Near yet so Far

20001008.desc: Beautiful sunny day, at a beautiful beach. Would've been the perfect getaway island if not for some very angry people living nearby
20001008.name: Beach Cleanup - Stage 1

20001009.desc: One has got to respect the tenacity of the native folk. They just won't give up! Show them that you're no pushover!
20001009.name: Beach Cleanup - Stage 2

20001010.desc: This odd group of natives show up daily to get a nice suntan. And like the other natives, they do not seem to appreciate you taking up their favourite spot.
20001010.name: Daily Tan

80000001.desc: Lin: Summoners, can you hear me? I'll be providing backup support! Don't forget to take your sanctioned supplies!
80000001.name: Frontier Spire: Sector SP 1

80000002.desc: Lin: Those monsters you've encountered... We've identified them as phantom monsters.
80000002.name: Frontier Spire: Sector SP 2

80000003.desc: Lin: How did these phantom monsters materialize? Why do they take such familiar forms? It's so eerie...
80000003.name: Frontier Spire: Sector SP 3

80000004.desc: Lin: Keep going, Summoners! Our reconnaissance shows plenty of Sectors ahead!
80000004.name: Frontier Spire: Sector SP 4

80000005.desc: Lin: Huh? The design of the Spire has changed... Be on the lookout for anything strange!
80000005.name: Frontier Spire: Sector SP 5

80000006.desc: Lin: Hmm... We still can't draw a conclusion with the data we have so far...
80000006.name: Frontier Spire: Sector SP 6

80000007.desc: Lin: But according to the Survey Office's estimates, you're reaching the midpoint of the Spire!
80000007.name: Frontier Spire: Sector SP 7

80000008.desc: Lin: How are you holding up? Keep up the good work, Summoners!
80000008.name: Frontier Spire: Sector SP 8

80000009.desc: Lin: You're just past the halfway mark! I'm detecting stronger phantoms ahead, so please be careful!
80000009.name: Frontier Spire: Sector SP 9

80000010.desc: Lin: This is great data! We'll be able to work better with this information. Please continue your exploration!
80000010.name: Frontier Spire: Sector SP 10

80000011.desc: Lin: H-Hello? Summoners? It seems that our communications are running into sporadic interference...
80000011.name: Frontier Spire: Sector SP 11

80000012.desc: Lin: If it gets [bzzt] dangerous <static> safety first!
80000012.name: Frontier Spire: Sector SP 12

80000014.desc: Lin: Be careful! We are detecting [static]!
80000014.name: Frontier Spire: Sector SP 14

83012802.desc: This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day in the summer. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside
83012802.name: Summer Paradise

83012803.desc: This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day in the summer. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside
83012803.name: Summer Paradise

83012804.desc: This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day in the summer. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside
83012804.name: Summer Paradise

83012805.desc: This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day in the summer. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside
83012805.name: Summer Paradise

83012806.desc: This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day in the summer. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside
83012806.name: Summer Paradise

83012807.desc: This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day in the summer. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside
83012807.name: Summer Paradise

83012808.desc: This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day in the summer. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside
83012808.name: Summer Paradise

83012809.desc: This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day in the summer. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside
83012809.name: Summer Paradise

83012810.name: Summer Paradise
