83014210.desc: Join Leona and Kula Diamond to defeat Mai Shiranui.
83014210.name: Contender Alpha

83014211.desc: Assist the Kusanagi family to gain dominance.
83014211.name: Scion of the Flame Lv. 1

83014212.desc: Assist the Kusanagi family to gain dominance.
83014212.name: Scion of the Flame Lv. 2

83014213.desc: Help the Kagura family reclaim their dominance.
83014213.name: Legacy of Kagura Lv. 1

83014214.desc: Help the Kagura family reclaim their dominance.
83014214.name: Legacy of Kagura Lv. 2

83014215.desc: Join the Yagami family to prove their might.
83014215.name: The Sun and The Moon Lv. 1

83014216.desc: Join the Yagami family to prove their might.
83014216.name: The Sun and The Moon Lv. 2

83014220.desc: As an ancient curse causes a familiar face to twist into a maddened visage, the battle to reclaim his sanity has begun. Ready to choose your path? Go!
83014220.name: The Blood of Iori

83014222.desc: Wait until sunset to subdue Orochi Iori.
83014222.name: Wild Rampage - "Dusk"

83014224.desc: Ambush Orochi Iori in the woods.
83014224.name: Night of the Moon

83014230.desc: Orochi's power, once sealed, has reawakened with the intent to destroy mankind. Choose your ally carefully?or regret the consequences. Ready? Go!
83014230.name: Ascension

83014231.desc: Assist Iori Yagami to seal away Orochi.
83014231.name: Hakkesshu

83015900.desc: Armaiti would like you to indulge her curiosity about your powers. A few games could pass the time.
83015900.name: Test of Strength

83015901.desc: As you wait out the long night with Armaiti, you can't help but focus on the unsettling atmosphere.
83015901.name: Unsettling Flickers

83015902.desc: The dark creatures seem to melt and strike from the shadows. Keep your eyes peeled!
83015902.name: An Unruly Night

83015903.desc: Slipping in between shadowed trees, you come upon the foreboding lair of Vohu, yazata of the wilds
83015903.name: Facing Darkness

83015904.desc: You've received an invitation from a stranger to partake in the annual Zartosht tradition, the Longest Night.
83015904.name: To Partake of Light

83015910.desc: Their accusations against each other placated for the time being, you turn your attention to tracking the culprit
83015910.name: Grudging Alliance

83015911.desc: Vohu appraises you with a discerning eye, inviting you to an impromptu competition against the creatures.
83015911.name: Test of Wits

83015912.desc: With no small amount of effort, the dying embers of Atar, the Eternal Flame, are found in the throes of a great evil
83015912.name: Faith and Fire

83015913.desc: The darkness rises forth in a massive black shape, its foul jaws poised to devour dawn now and forever. Bring the light back!
83015913.name: Rising Dawn

83015914.desc: While Armaiti busies herself with the eternal flame, you spend some quality time with Vohu patrolling the roads.
83015914.name: Sentinel of Flame

83016000.desc: While wandering around a foreign forest, Mugen stumbles upon strange mushrooms and stranger visions...
83016000.name: Boisterous Beginnings

83016001.desc: Calm and collected, the bespectacled samurai Jin has his own way of searching for a certain girl in a pink kimono.
83016001.name: Searching with Strangers

83016002.desc: Brash and rude, Mugen breaks to his own beat, but with a big bounty on the line, the search is on.
83016002.name: Brash Bounty

83016003.desc: The girl you met earlier -Fuu- hasn't returned in some time. The woods whisper ominously; this is no place for the defenseless.
83016003.name: Amiable Acquaintance

83016004.desc: Jin follows a trail of broken branches deeper into the forest and finds a memento of Fuu's lying on the ground...
83016004.name: Track and Trail

83016005.desc: A splash of water catches Jin's attention. With night falling fast, a still lake could be a dangerous pitfall.
83016005.name: Lakeside Lullaby

83016006.desc: Mugen investigates a village just outside the forest for witnesses, but finds more than he bargained for...
83016006.name: Village Vandals

83016007.desc: Coming across an abundance of wasabi roots strewn along the path to the village, Mugen suspects something is off.
83016007.name: Wasabi Warrior

83016008.desc: An unnatural gloom falling over the forest rouses your suspicions - the stench of evil clings heavily in the air.
83016008.name: Shadowy Suspicions

83016009.desc: A sudden wind cutting through the forest damages all in its wake, but leaves no wounds. Something is amiss.
83016009.name: Wrathful Wind

83016100.desc: Fuu has gone off by herself in search of water, but can she resist the allure of the "jewels of the mountain"?
83016100.name: Moot Mushrooms

83016101.desc: Fuu is at it again! Will she find water for Mugen after all, or will she actually strike gold this time?
83016101.name: Moot Mushrooms, Too!

83016200.desc: All evidence points back to a mysterious adversary from the past, long thought slain under a bridge...
83016200.name: Full Moon Duel

83016201.desc: Shoryu's mastery over ki will put your sword to the test. Are you ready for the Tsujigiri?
83016201.name: Full Moon Duel EX

83016600.desc: The festive season is here in full force! Will you take a merry jaunt through the center of the village, or run wild with celebration in the nearby forest?
83016600.name: A Festive Mood

83016601.desc: The village is abuzz with excitement over the coming feast. Take a jaunt and look around!
83016601.name: Village Jaunt

83016602.desc: The forests here are decked out in a lavish coat of snow, glittering in the last light of day. What a great place to run about!
83016602.name: Forest Celebration

83016603.desc: Put together a fabulous roast with the villagers! Do you have enough fire in your belly?
83016603.name: A Fiery Feast

83016604.desc: The river here is still flowing with vigor in spite of winter's grasp?like the pulse of the forest itself.
83016604.name: Running Water

83016605.desc: Mysteries and myths abound in these dark tales of men and monsters alike.
83016605.name: Dark Tales

83016606.desc: A prime spot for gathering fallen branches and choice kindling for the village's blazing hearth.
83016606.name: Winter's Hearth

83016607.desc: With raucous laughter and shouts of joy, indulge in an electrifying performance!
83016607.name: Thunderous Cheer

83016608.desc: As the land begins to dim from the setting sun, the snowscape is awash in glittering orange hues.
83016608.name: Dimming Light

83016811.desc: With wariness and trepidation, you step through a portal into a world you thought had long shattered
83016811.name: A Familiar Echo

83016812.desc: As Azius attempts to return to hiding, a familiar figure interferes with his plans and brings grim news
83016812.name: Growing Tensions

83016821.desc: You find yourself drawn into an interminable wasteland in the void of your own mind. Someone has called you here.
83016821.name: Voice from the Void

83016822.desc: The mystery deepens as The Queen probes at your mind, beckoning and enticing you...
83016822.name: Hand of Salvation

83018000.desc: Bountiful experience, karma, zel, and other various rewards awaits you! Complete this mission once a day and reap the rewards!
83018000.name: Treasure Paradise

83510001.desc: A strange eclipse, an unfamiliar silhouette. He who holds the key has tapped into a long lost power, a hypnotic force that is spread across Grand Gaia.
83510001.name: The Keymaster's Eclipse Lv. 1

83520001.desc: Dark and light, good and evil... Can you maintain balance, or will you give in to the Keymaster's magic? The force of the eclipse is growing...
83520001.name: The Keymaster's Eclipse Lv. 2

99990001.desc: Lin: Summoners, can you hear me? I'll be providing backup support! Don't forget to take your sanctioned supplies!
99990001.name: Frontier Spire: Sector 1

99990002.desc: Lin: Those monsters you've encountered... We've identified them as phantom monsters.
99990002.name: Frontier Spire: Sector 2

99990003.desc: Lin: How did these phantom monsters materialize? Why do they take such familiar forms? It's so eerie...
99990003.name: Frontier Spire: Sector 3

99990004.desc: Lin: Keep going, Summoners! Our reconnaissance shows plenty of Sectors ahead!
99990004.name: Frontier Spire: Sector 4

99990005.desc: Lin: Huh? The design of the Spire has changed... Be on the lookout for anything strange!
99990005.name: Frontier Spire: Sector 5

99990006.desc: Lin: Hmm... We still can't draw a conclusion with the data we have so far...
99990006.name: Frontier Spire: Sector 6

99990007.desc: Lin: But according to the Survey Office's estimates, you're reaching the midpoint of the Spire!
99990007.name: Frontier Spire: Sector 7

99990008.desc: Lin: How are you holding up? Keep up the good work, Summoners!
99990008.name: Frontier Spire: Sector 8

99990009.desc: Lin: You're just past the halfway mark! I'm detecting stronger phantoms ahead, so please be careful!
99990009.name: Frontier Spire: Sector 9

99990010.desc: Lin: This is great data! We'll be able to work better with this information. Please continue your exploration!
99990010.name: Frontier Spire: Sector 10

99990011.desc: Lin: H-Hello? Summoners? It seems that our communications are running into sporadic interference...
99990011.name: Frontier Spire: Sector 11

99990012.desc: Lin: If it gets [bzzt] dangerous <static> safety first!
99990012.name: Frontier Spire: Sector 12

99990014.desc: Lin: Be careful! We are detecting [static]!
99990014.name: Frontier Spire: Sector 14

99990017.desc: A terrible screeching sound hurts your ears when you try to tune in.
99990017.name: Frontier Spire: Sector 17

99990019.desc: Lin: Summoners! Thank goodness that we managed to establish communication again!
99990019.name: Frontier Spire: Sector 19

99990020.desc: Lin: Thanks to the data you've collected, we've managed to make some sense of the situation!
99990020.name: Frontier Spire: Sector 20

99990021.desc: Lin: While the origins of the Spire remain a mystery, it seems that the phantoms you've encountered...
99990021.name: Frontier Spire: Sector 21

99990022.desc: Lin: ...are manifestations of past experiences you and other Summoners have gone through.
99990022.name: Frontier Spire: Sector 22

99990023.desc: Lin: They're solid enough to be mistaken for the real thing, but they're just that - Phantoms.
99990023.name: Frontier Spire: Sector 23

99990024.desc: Lin: At this point we're still not sure why or how the Spire is able to do this
99990024.name: Frontier Spire: Sector 24
